mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore shaking hands with U.S. Airman Marion Musilli
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Airman Marion L. Mussili shaking hands with Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr. immediately after their arrival at MATS (Military Air Transport Service) terminal, Andrews AFB (Air Force Base), Maryland from Europe. Congressman Moore interceded in the confinement of Airman Mussili by the Greek Government after his conviction for hitting a pedestrian with a military vehicle. Moore then brought the airman back to the states with him.
